abstract: The handler that processes a reordering transaction.

declaration.code: var didReorder: ((NSDiffableDataSourceTransaction<SectionIdentifierType, ItemIdentifierType>) -> Void)? { get set }

overview:
## Discussion

The system calls the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionViewDiffableDataSource-9tqpa/ReorderingHandlers-swift.struct/didReorder] handler after a reordering transaction ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSDiffableDataSourceTransaction-swift.struct]) occurs, so you can update your data backing store with information about the changes.

items.description: The handler that determines whether you can reorder a particular item.
items.name: canReorderItem

items.description: The handler that prepares the diffable data source for reordering its items.
items.name: willReorder

title: didReorder
